title: Ticket #251: Figure out good linux distro to use with the PS3
description: Figure out what is the latest CellSDK and for which linux distribution it needs to have. Then tell NMI what that is so they install it on the PS3 in the NMI lab. Then, I may have to port Condor to it, depending if it can run the sles ppc port or not.
remarks:
2009-May-27 10:41:51 by psilord:
I forgot the exact thing to be installed upon the ps3, but this was decided a long time ago. I do know whatever was chosen had the most modern cellsdk on it. I think it was fedora 10.

2009-May-27 11:07:03 by matt:
BTW, might want to go with F11 since it'll live longer than F10, and it's released now, whereas it wasn't when this ticket was created, IIRC.
creator: psilord
